ygData.subject: Magician help
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I have a mage and I am looking to get better armour for him. Right now i have a few mesh things, a collar of undead protection and the sr apprentice robe
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I have a mage and I am looking to get better armour for him. Right now i
have a few mesh things, a collar of undead protection and the sr apprentice
robe (god i am going to be sad to actually have to get rid of this, cause it
is so cute). I am also a mini tank. I love to go out and pull and live close
to death on the regular basis. I have a good team, so i almost rarely die.
But as i do this, i also am going to need a little better protection for
myself and i feel so limited because i take more damage easily. .. SO can
anyone have any advice on what to get for my mage and where to get it. The
Stuff You get from GuK isn't much..its only benefit is it ways less. i hope
there is better.. I am level 15 right now and in dire need of help. .. oh
yeah.. what about the staffs ? like the crystal staff, water and slime staff
? where are these located .. I am just looking for some advice

Thanks all.

Ps. I am going to try to do the chat server guild thing wed. But my job
times fluxuate, so i might not get off work in time. i am PST so its going
to be tough.. but i will do my best for my family..

Reuben
a.k.a Nate of the Rodcet Nife server..
